page.title: 19Hobbies in Culcheth
page.content: We interviewed old people, primary and secondary children, and adults. Altogether we interviewed 267 people. This was to collect information about people's favourite hobbies and sports in Culcheth in 1985. The three most popular hobbies for primary children were football, swimming and running, the least popular were rounders, cricket and show-jumping. The most popular hobbies for secondary children were football, golf and tennis, the least popular were music, snooker and ice-skating. Adults favourites were gardening, knitting and tennis. Their least popular were badminton, dancing and rugby. The popular hobbies for old folk were knitting, cooking and T.V., the least popular were walking and rugby.
